dataList.title: 백설선택지1
dataList.eventDesc:
Um coração dilacerado em milhares de pedaços deve ser mantido longe de todos os olhos, então ele se enterrou no chão e se enroscou.

No entanto, alguém tem que arrancar essas raízes espinhosas,
pois não há ferida que possa permanecer desenterrada.

Os pecadores trocaram olhares.
Estar envolto em uma dor penetrante e aguda era algo a ser evitado até mesmo em sonhos.
dataList.prevDesc:
As videiras crescendo no chão são um incômodo.
Talvez haja uma chance de se livrar delas?
dataList.behaveDesc:
A terra seca deve ser revolvida.
Qual pecador estava à altura da tarefa?
successDesc:
{0} walked with shaky steps.
With bare hands, they dug up the roots.

In their hands were the doubts of others.
The Sinner realized…

That while the injury may heal, distrust might take deep root in their heart.
failureDesc:
{0} could not uproot anything.
It was no easy task, after all—entangled so tightly together, one couldn’t make heads or tails of it.

Clutching itself, the durable web of fiber continued to expand,
and the Sinners will continue to suffer.

dataList.title: 백설선택지2
dataList.eventDesc:
O chão começou a tremer levemente.
Os Sinners permaneceram quietos, mas podiam ler nos olhares um do outro o único pensamento que compartilhavam:
“Um de nós não deveria se levantar para suportar a dor para que o resto seja poupado do sofrimento?”
dataList.prevDesc: Branca de Neve Opção 2 será lançada
dataList.behaveDesc:
Uma pequena rachadura foi encontrada no chão.
Quem será aquele que irá selá-la?
successDesc:
The root impales {0}’s chest and extends skyward.
The Sinner gasps for air, but that’s none of your business.
failureDesc:
The roots whisper as they skewer each Sinner:
“All of us should feel the pain.”
“Just as your sadness throws gloom over me, so should pain be felt equally.”
The thousands of roots, a unified whole, piercing into everyone’s flesh.

dataList.title: 백설선택지4
dataList.eventDesc:
Como se para demonstrar a dureza ingrata da vida, e apesar de suportar tanta dor, nem uma única flor parecia florescer do cadáver.
Em vez disso, os Pecadores descobrem frutas nascidas nele.

Um engole audivelmente para drenar suas salivações.
Uma vontade de conhecer o sabor de uma fruta tornada fértil com um Pecador começa a crescer.
dataList.prevDesc: Branca de Neve Choice 4 está chegando em breve
dataList.behaveDesc:
Um pecador eventualmente alcançou a fruta.
Quem entre eles deu a mordida?
successDesc:
{0} took a bite out of the fruit.
Their tongue is doused in pure delight.

Yet it’s more of a curse, as no other flavor will ever again be able to rouse them.
failureDesc:
Something was eating away at the Sinner from the inside.
It was something more humiliating than a bug craving sweetness, no; it was an emotion, an ignoble feeling.

The Sinner looked around.
They were now envious of everything, no longer able to love themself.

dataList.title: 백설선택지5
dataList.eventDesc:
Os pecadores olharam para seu rosto.
Eles contemplaram as memórias desgastadas dentro...

Até os buracos deixados por pragas.

Uma maçã não culmina quando amadurece para um vermelho brilhante.
Quando a maçã escurece, racha, murcha e atrai criaturas inferiores...
É quando ela encontrou sua felicidade dourada.

Os pecadores sabiam que agora era a hora de trazer a maçã para a terra.
dataList.prevDesc:
O fruto foi gerado novamente.
Talvez esta seja uma chance de destruí-lo de uma vez por todas?
dataList.behaveDesc:
A maçã está aberta para ataque.
Quem foi o Pecador para derrubar a maçã em seu momento de felicidade?
successDesc:
{0} brought the apple to the ground.
The fall left a dull thud.

The fruit was emptied of its lifeblood long ago; only futility remained.
This attack allowed the Sinners a brief moment of respite.
failureDesc:
{0} could not strike the apple.
It must have been the Sinner’s wavering heart that caused them to falter.

The mind is such a superficial thing.
In any mind, you will find a sense of inferiority that likes to belittle the self.

dataList.title: 구더기사과선택지1
dataList.eventDesc:
O corpo da maçã quebrou, e a fruta furiosa ainda cresceu.
Será que o Golden Bough realmente está lá?

"Vou dar uma olhada!"
Yuri disse aos outros.

O pecador com braço de inseto parece nervoso com isso.
Ele quer ir com ela, talvez?
dataList.prevDesc: Talvez o Ramo de Ouro esteja dentro da maçã?
dataList.behaveDesc:
Você não pode simplesmente mandar Yuri para lá sozinha.
Que Sinner será capaz de mantê-la segura?
successDesc:
The fruit’s cracked shell suddenly began to rattle as if it would jump at any moment.

{0} managed to escape, but it seems Yuri couldn’t.
The fruit’s flesh melted to form a new body.

Don’t feel too guilty about it. One lost life is better than two.
failureDesc:
The fruit’s cracked shell suddenly began to rattle as if it would jump at any moment.

{0} was too occupied to notice it in time.
They managed to get away but ended up injured.

Yuri was even later to notice. The fruit’s flesh had already melted with her to form a new body.

It’s unfortunate, but there’s nothing we can do about it. One of our own got hurt, too.

dataList.prevDesc:
A Anormalidade parece chateada.
Parece querer algo, mas o que devemos dar?

dataList.title: 아즈텍원판선택지2
dataList.eventDesc: Parece que um dos pecadores terá que fazer o trabalho de uma boneca de barro.
dataList.behaveDesc: Quem apaziguaria a Anormalidade?
successDesc:
It appears that {0}’s blood was fresh enough.
Satiated, the Abnormality calmed down for a moment.
failureDesc:
It didn’t seem to like {0}’s blood.
The Abnormality looks even madder than before.

dataList.prevDesc:
O calor da Anormalidade está desgastando todo mundo.
Teremos que fazer uma oferenda para acalmar sua ira.

dataList.title: 아즈텍원판선택지4
dataList.eventDesc: Parece que um dos pecadores terá que fazer o trabalho de uma boneca de barro.
dataList.behaveDesc: De quem seria o coração mais frio entre eles?
successDesc:
{0} was able to cool the Abnormality’s fervor.
The flame shrunk to a flicker.
failureDesc:
Maybe {0} was warmer than we thought.
The Abnormality’s belching an even fiercer flame now.

dataList.prevDesc: Você sente um brilho perigoso.
dataList.behaveDesc:
As estrelas estão brilhando.
Quando elas brilharem, elas roubarão toda a nossa visão.
Que presente as estrelas gostariam?

dataList.title: 아즈텍원판선택지6
dataList.eventDesc: Parece que um dos pecadores terá que fazer o trabalho de uma boneca de barro.
dataList.behaveDesc: De quem é a voz que poderia embalar o sono das estrelas?
successDesc:
{0}’s lullaby brought the stars into a deep slumber.
Their starlight will leave us be for a while.
failureDesc:
{0}’s lullaby ended up waking the stars.
It appears that they are about to punish us.

An unimaginably bright flash will burn all of our eyes.
Perhaps the cosmos will reveal itself before our scorched sockets.

dataList.prevDesc: Você derrotou o inimigo, mas agora ele está de volta. O que está acontecendo?
Vá em frente!
Tiras de fitas rosas flutuam nesta direção.

dataList.title: 분홍신선택지2
dataList.eventDesc: O nó dos desejos deve ser desfeito.
dataList.prevDesc:
“Saia dessa! O que quer que esteja lhe dizendo, é tudo mentira!”

Alguém gritou.

Graças a esse aviso, você percebeu que enfeites de ganância adornavam as fitas.
Você tem que desatar o nó carregado de desejo.
dataList.behaveDesc: Quem pode desfazer o nó?
successDesc:
“Aargh…”

“My head is pounding.”

“Nnh… Was just getting good.”

The ribbons binding the team scattered and melted away.

“Freedom! Freeness!”

An unfamiliar voice reaches your ears, but for now, you should help the Sinners recover first.
failureDesc:
The pink ribbons ended up enshrouding everyone.
You can’t find the strength to resist, or even think.

It seems…

You’ll be forever unable to escape.

dataList.title: Eternal Rest
dataList.eventDesc:
Um soldado foi esmagado sob os escombros, ofegando em agonia.

"Por favor, me mate... Dói muito."

Você não pode ignorar essa pessoa.
dataList.behaveDesc: Quem se encarregará de levar a paz a este soldado?
successDesc:
“Thank… you…”

The soldier’s life was delivered a coup de grâce by the knife.
The human rhythm that rose through the blade soon ceased, and the soldier was eased into eternal rest.
failureDesc:
“Gyaagh…!”

The knife came down upon the wrong spot.
The soldier’s bloody coughs and face full of terror felt like they endured for an eternity.

It took a while for that suffering soldier to pass away.
Regret and hate were the final things in those eyes.

dataList.title: Exhilarating Edutainment Featuring Excess Violence!
dataList.eventDesc:
“Gostando da cor vermelha! Gostando da cor vermelha! Gostei! Gostei!”

Um grupo de ciborgues gritou junto com um ritmo estranho.

“Vermelho 4!!!”

Exultando o número alto, eles giraram a roleta.
Então eles entregaram uma bola de roleta para um dos Sinners.
dataList.behaveDesc:
Parece que a bola tem que entrar em um bolso vermelho com um número maior que 4.
Quem deve girar a bola?
successDesc:
“Losing! Defeat!! Urgh-ack!”

The “upgraded” croupier fell to the ground, buzzing and sparking.
Even its final throes felt rhythmic.
failureDesc:
“Get beaten! Get all thrashed, real pulped!”

As soon as the cyborg saw the ball roll into the wrong pocket, it swung its massive arm to smack the Sinner.

With the Sinner crumpled on the floor, the game had to come to a stop…

dataList.title: Exhilarating Edutainment Featuring Excess Violence!
dataList.eventDesc:
“Não há tempo agora~ Para ficar todo~ D.O.R.I.O!”

Os ciborgues risonhos voltaram para a roleta.

“Tipo amarelo! Tipo amarelo! Amarelo! Amarelo! Amarelo!”

“Amarelo 6!!!”
dataList.behaveDesc:
Desta vez, a bola tem que entrar em um bolso amarelo com um número maior que 6.
Quem deve girar a bola?
successDesc:
“All lost! Foil again!! Ya-aaa-argh!”

The “upgraded” croupier fell to the ground, buzzing and sparking.
failureDesc:
“Here comes the fist to you~! Ready? Bready-tready-steady!”

The cyborg swung its massive arm to smack the Sinner.

With the Sinner crumpled on the floor, the game had to come to a stop…

dataList.title: Exhilarating Edutainment Featuring Excess Violence!
dataList.eventDesc:
“Não dá para dizer não à diversão! Nem um pouco!”

O grupo de ciborgues cantores gira a roda.

“Gostando da cor azul! Gostando da cor azul! Azul! Azul! Azul!”

“Azul 8!!!”
dataList.behaveDesc:
Desta vez, a bola tem que entrar em um bolso azul com um número maior que 8.
Quem deve girar a bola?
successDesc:
“Everything! Gone up bust!! Dammit!”

The “upgraded” croupier fell to the ground, buzzing and sparking.

All the other cyborgs broke down with it at the same time.
Have we won…?

You noticed something glowing in their pile of tin rubble.
You carefully picked it up.
failureDesc:
BAP!

The cyborg swung its massive arm to smack the Sinner.

“GAME OVER! Consolation prize time!”
The group of cyborgs tossed something at us, then walked away.

dataList.title: Before a Sealed Door
dataList.eventDesc:
O aço é grosso, mas pode não ser impossível para um Sinner movê-lo entreaberto.
Quem seria a pessoa certa para fazer isso?
dataList.behaveDesc: Quem poderia abrir esta porta?
successDesc:
{0} pushed at the door with all their might.

“Hnngh…”

The door shook little by little but refused to give way.

“All right, you’ve done enough…”

I tried to get the Sinner to stop, but {0} kept on pushing, fully focused on the door.

After some time…

“There!”

The door was opened.
A path was hidden behind it.
failureDesc:
{0} pushed at the door with all their might.

“…It won’t work.”

The door didn’t so much as budge.

As much as you wanted to know what was behind that door…
There was no choice but to leave the room for now.

dataList.title: Before a Sealed Door
dataList.eventDesc:
Tem que haver alguma maneira de passar além da força bruta.
Talvez uma olhada completa ao redor possa revelar algo.
dataList.behaveDesc: Um pecador atento seria bom nisso…
successDesc:
{0} looked around the door.

“……”

After tinkering with something on the wall,
{0} let out a triumphant grunt.

“Huh?!”

The door was open.

Apparently, there was a protruding brick next to the door.
{0} explained that sliding it back into place got the door to open, then proceeded through.

There was a hidden path behind the door.
failureDesc:
{0} looked around the door.

But, they were unable to find anything even after having a good crack at it.

“Oh well…”

We had no choice but to leave the room behind.

dataList.title: The First Gate
dataList.eventDesc:
A floresta é densa, mas ainda há brechas nela.

Se pisarmos com cuidado, poderemos atacar os Inquisidores por trás.
Isso nos daria uma vantagem considerável na batalha que se aproxima.
dataList.behaveDesc: Quem é mais adequado para se esgueirar pela floresta para uma emboscada?
successDesc:
{0} slowly walked into the woods.
Soon enough, a few Inquisitors fell to the ground.

“Heretics! The heretics are here!”

Though we couldn’t take them all down at once, it was enough to break their formation.
We’ll be able to pass through once we take the rest down.
failureDesc:
{0} slowly walked into the woods.
Soon enough, a commotion broke out at the gate.

“What is it?”

“Looks to be a heretic; what are they doing here?”

“Must’ve tripped.”

…Sounds like the ambush was unsuccessful.

dataList.title: The First Gate
dataList.eventDesc:
Podemos distraí-los fazendo barulho.
O problema é como fazer isso...

"Ouçam, ouçam — pois eu tenho um plano!"

É melhor ouvi-la.

...Você não tem certeza se é exatamente a melhor ideia, mas também pode não fazer mal.
dataList.behaveDesc: Então, quem será o responsável por colocá-lo em prática?
successDesc:
{0} made their move.

“Wait, is that…”
“Hey, we should check it out.”

The Inquisitors guarding the gate left their post to investigate the source of the noise.

“So doth the diversion return! ‘Tis exactly as I spake! A plan without flaw, from conception to conclusion!”

The mastermind proudly exclaims.

Honestly didn’t expect it to work this well…
We’ll be able to pass once we’ve dealt with the remaining Inquisitors.
failureDesc:
{0} made their move.

“…A heretic! Throw the nails!”

“They were coming from that direction, saw a dozen other heretics there.”

…Of course this would happen.
No choice but to fight them head-on now.

dataList.title: Who Judges the Judge
dataList.eventDesc:
“Hereges! Os hereges apareceram!”

Conforme os Pecadores se aproximavam, os Inquisidores jogavam suas vítimas de lado para nos atacar.

“Seus bastardos!”

Sinclair estava contra eles na vanguarda.
Mas, aquele martelo pode ser grande demais para a arma de Sinclair parar.
dataList.behaveDesc:
Sinclair realmente deveria lidar com isso?
Ou você deveria ordenar que outro Sinner repelisse o ataque?
successDesc:
You figured it’d be best to ask {0} to do it.
The hammer bounced off, and the Inquisitors were perturbed by the retaliation.

We’ll be able to keep the flow of the battle in our favor by taking the lead now.

After all, this is his fight first and foremost.

“Raaaah!!”

Sinclair locked his halberd against the handle of the hammer and parried it to the side.

With their leader’s attack thwarted, the Inquisitors were thrown into disarray.
We’ll be able to keep the flow of the battle in our favor by taking the lead now.
failureDesc:
You asked {0} to deflect the attack, but…
The motion of the giant hammer couldn’t be stopped.

The Inquisitors surrounded {0}, who was now on the back foot.
We have to fight on with this disadvantage.

dataList.title: A Rotting Corpse’s Memento
dataList.eventDesc:
Um pecador facilmente atraído por bugigangas e enfeites provavelmente estaria disposto a vasculhar essa bagunça mórbida para pegar o item.
Por outro lado, alguém desinteressado em tais coisas não ficará feliz em fazer esse pedido.
dataList.behaveDesc: Quem deve entrar e recuperar o item?
successDesc:
{0} found a bent sigil of N Corp. between the manes.

It might not have been worth reaching into a corpse for, but it has to prove useful somewhere down the line.

You took the sigil and left the room, comforting the Sinners who were retching at the sight.
failureDesc:
{0} rifled and dug through the manes, but ultimately found nothing.

“Hrk… Geh…”

The more the corpse was ransacked, the more {0} retched.
…This won’t be worth pursuing further.

Telling {0} that they did their best, we left the room.
We lost something and gained nothing.

{0} rifled and dug through the manes, but ultimately found nothing.

“Hrk… Geh…”

The more the corpse was ransacked, the more {0} retched.
…This won’t be worth pursuing further.

Telling {0} that they did their best, we left the room.
We lost something and gained nothing.

dataList.title: Rite of Suppuration
dataList.eventDesc:
“…Não vai funcionar. Muitos Inquisidores estão guardando a outra rota.”

Tivemos um Sinner explorando o perímetro, e parece que esse é o caminho de menor resistência.
Alguém com uma vontade ardente pode ser capaz de suportar essa dor.
dataList.behaveDesc: Quem deve ser enviado para trilhar o caminho?
successDesc:
{0} ran across the heated road on bare feet.
The others frowned at the rancid stench of burning flesh.

Groaning with agony, {0} made it to the other side…

An altar with a red seal and a lever rose before them.
When {0} pulled the lever, the road quickly cooled.
The rest of us were able to tread the path safely.
failureDesc:
{0} ran across the heated road on bare feet.
The others frowned at the rancid stench of burning flesh.

{0} almost made that painful advance midway…

But they couldn’t bear it any longer and hurried back.
It looks like we’re not taking this route.
We’ll have to follow the other path and deal with the many Inquisitors there.

Don Quixote declares:

'I shan't walk bare of feet!'

dataList.title: Rite of Confrontation
dataList.eventDesc:
Parece que sentar na cadeira é como você começa o rito.
Que tipo de rito pode ser não está claro... mas é a única maneira de abrir o portão.
dataList.behaveDesc: Que pecador será obrigado a sentar-se?
successDesc:
{0} sat on the chair.
…Dreadful screams filled the room.
A constant stream of tears ran down {0}’s face.

Soon enough, the bowl was full of tears.
When it was placed on the altar at the door, the altar slid down, opening things up.

“Gasp, huff… Hic.”

{0}’s eyes were shaking.
It’s probably best not to ask what they saw.

“…There’s a sigil beyond the door.”

Taking the blue sigil, we left the room.
failureDesc:
{0} sat on the chair.
…Dreadful screams filled the room.
A constant stream of tears ran down {0}’s face.

But it wasn’t enough to fill the bowl.
It seems the Sinner was so shocked that tears struggled to even wring themselves out.
We left the room, helping {0}, stricken with sorrow, to their feet.

dataList.title: Rite of Penance
dataList.eventDesc: Alguém deve pisar nos espinhos e empalar os próprios membros.
dataList.behaveDesc: Quem deve ser mandado para os pontões?
successDesc:
{0} stood on the spike-laden device.
You quietly nodded when the Sinner looked back with trembling eyes.

…A terrible scream echoed through the hall.

Soon enough, the door rumbled open.
Inside, an orange sigil was waiting to be picked up.
We took the sigil and ushered the impaled {0} out of the hall.
failureDesc:
{0} stood on the spike-laden device.
You quietly nodded when the Sinner looked back with trembling eyes.

…A terrible scream echoed through the hall.

But there was no response.
Maybe the Sinner hadn’t suffered enough?
We made sure to have {0} try the rite several times, but the door still didn’t open.

dataList.title: Rite of Conclusion
dataList.eventDesc: Não parece haver outra maneira; a conversa é nossa única opção.
dataList.behaveDesc: Quem é o melhor orador entre todos nós?
successDesc:
{0} approached the Inquisitor.

“…You, well-spoken one. Your words, they were persuasive.”

After a while of parlance, the Inquisitor opened the gate for us.
failureDesc:
{0} approached the Inquisitor.

“……”

Yet the Inquisitor remains silent.

“…Rejected.”

We could only hear refusals from time to time.
{0} eventually had to give up on talking and returned to us.
…Looks like we’ll have to speak with our fists.

dataList.title: 던전 103003 선택지
dataList.eventDesc:
Uma inscrição acima do portão fechado diz:

Prove seu terror e medos
Encha este recipiente com lágrimas
dataList.behaveDesc: Quem entre nós consegue derramar mais lágrimas?
successDesc:
{0}’s tears filled the bowl.
The pedestal lowered into the ground, and the gate opened.
failureDesc:
{0} couldn’t shed enough to fill the bowl.
The door had to be pushed open with everyone’s combined strength.

dataList.title: 던전 103004 선택지 : 짓무름의 의식
dataList.eventDesc:
Você vê uma porta do outro lado de uma passagem em brasa.
A placa ao lado diz:

Prove sua fraqueza e supuração
Abra um caminho com mobilização
dataList.behaveDesc: Quem pode atravessar esta passagem aquecida?
successDesc:
{0} walked across the burning road on bare feet.
When the Sinner made it to the other side, a panel rose next to the door.

When {0} used it, the passage cooled.
The rest of us were able to tread through safely.
failureDesc:
{0} set foot on the burning road with bare feet.
However, the Sinner turned around and came back, unable to bear the heat.
We all had to cross the searing passage together.

dataList.title: 던전 103004 선택지 : 속죄의 의식
dataList.eventDesc:
Uma passagem está escrita acima do grande portão.

Somente aqueles que se arrependem podem encontrar movimento
Espinhe-se, expie-se através da flagelação
dataList.behaveDesc: Quem seria melhor em arrependimento?
successDesc:
{0} stood on the spike-laden device.
A painful scream echoed through the hall.

Soon enough, the door rumbled open.
Looks like {0} has been rid of emotional baggage.
failureDesc:
{0} stood on the spike-laden device.
A scream echoed through the hall.
But there was no response.

We only got through after trying the rite several times.

dataList.title: 던전 103006 2차 선택지
dataList.eventDesc: Vamos tentar conversar primeiro.
dataList.behaveDesc: Qual Pecador seria capaz de influenciar os Inquisidores?
successDesc:
{0} approached an Inquisitor and delivered a captivating speech.
After some discussion, they opened the way for us.
failureDesc:
{0} approached an Inquisitor to try and hold some dialogue.
After a few short exchanges, the Inquisitor kicked out our Sinner.

Seems today the sword is mightier than the pen.

dataList.title: 늑대선택지1
dataList.eventDesc:
Após se posicionar, ele salta para nós.
Ele está se aproximando mais rápido do que o esperado.
dataList.prevDesc:
O lobo está agachado!
Ele está se preparando para atacar?
dataList.behaveDesc: Quem poderia deter a fera agitada?
successDesc:
The swift beast was stopped in its tracks.
Now it glares at us in a wary stance.

It won’t stay that way for long, though.
Perhaps that’ll remind it of the pain that left those scars…
failureDesc:
The wolf’s advance and subsequent assault were unhindered.
Was there ever a chance to deter what’s too fast for the eyes?

The attack left a serious wound.

dataList.title: 뱀선택지1
dataList.eventDesc:
A fúria continua.
Pode atingir um ponto crítico mais rápido do que o esperado.
dataList.prevDesc:
Há algo diferente em sua aura!
Sua raiva transbordou?
dataList.behaveDesc: Quem vai deter a ira do monstro?
successDesc:
The Sinner delivered a powerful attack to the raging foe.
It seems to be thrown into confusion by this unexpected move.

This could be our chance.
Or a greater threat…
failureDesc:
An attempt to counter the monster was made.

However, it missed as expected, angering our foe further.

dataList.title: 크로머선택지1
dataList.eventDesc:
Kromer finge a aparência de estar calma e serena.
Mas o prego em sua mão brilha como um punhal, esperando para rasgar a fachada de calma.
dataList.prevDesc:
Há algo de agourento no olhar de Kromer.
Seus olhos estão cheios de ódio e desejo!
dataList.behaveDesc: Quem enfrentará o instrumento pontiagudo de Kromer?
successDesc:
Kromer was struck by the unexpected counterattack.
Her hateful eyes lost focus for a moment.

The sharp weapon in her hands failed to pierce anyone.
It fell to the ground in tranquilizing silence.
failureDesc:
Kromer stumbled for a moment, but deftly dodged the counterattack.
She backs down as if she expected this and glares into our group like a hunter seeking prey.

Someone has to be the victim of that hatred and yearning.

dataList.title: 크로머선택지2
dataList.eventDesc:
Kromer está respirando pesadamente. Talvez seja um efeito colateral da transformação.

Sua postura está instável, e seus olhos estão olhando para outro lugar.

Com seu foco interrompido, podemos conseguir dar um golpe crítico.
dataList.prevDesc: Kromer está ficando fatigada. Ela vai expor uma vulnerabilidade em breve.
dataList.behaveDesc: Quem será capaz de aproveitar essa oportunidade?
successDesc:
{0} circled around Kromer’s fleshy mass to disorient her.

Soon enough, she let her guard down.
{0} didn’t miss this chance to deliver a devastating blow.

That seemed pretty effective. A deep, indelible wound was left on Kromer’s body.
Could this be it?
failureDesc:
{0} circled around Kromer’s fleshy mass to disorient her.

“…Ah.”

However, for some unknown reason, {0} froze stiff on the spot.

Was it the perturbation of witnessing her writhing flesh up close, or was it the fear that Kromer’s eyes struck?

The child couldn’t so much as try drawing their weapon before returning to your side. They seem mentally exhausted.

There’s little you can do about it. Just fight her the usual way.

dataList.title: 단수어선택지1
dataList.prevDesc: A barriga daquela coisa sem cabeça parece ter se esticado até o limite.
dataList.eventDesc:
Seu abdômen está cheio de líquido vermelho.
Parece que ele pode expeli-lo a qualquer momento.
Um borbulhante respingo de sangue pode ser visto ao redor de seu pescoço decepado.
dataList.behaveDesc: Quem poderia fechar sua garganta?
successDesc:
{0} quickly ran over and looked up at its neck.
The Sinner had no means to seal a severed throat.
After a quick brainstorm, {0} used their weapon to cut its belly open.
Liquid spilled out onto the ground, losing all of its built-up pressure.
failureDesc:
{0} quickly ran over and cut its neck.
However, shortening an already sliced throat wasn’t going to weaken that bloody stream.

“A mistake.”

One Sinner commented, but what is done is done.
There was only one chance, and it has been squandered.

dataList.title: 골목파수견선택지1
dataList.prevDesc:
Rugidos estrondosos se reúnem e faíscas violetas ficam inquietas.
Para onde elas devem ir?
dataList.eventDesc:
Flashes roxos estão saltando entre os polos.
Se eles não forem capturados, algo ruim vai acontecer.
dataList.behaveDesc: Quem vai pegar esses parafusos irritantes?
successDesc:
{0} lodged their weapon into the ground.
“Did you fry your brains?”
Someone outcried, but it took little time for that concern to be proven wrong.
The bulky bolt of lightning gravitated toward the Sinner’s weapon and was sucked into the ground.
“…It will then be conducted.”
Indeed, the rejected sparks jumped into the utility pole near the weapon.
Ironically enough, the king of the alleyway was struck by electricity.
failureDesc:
{0} lodged their weapon into the ground.
The Sinner was trying to guide the rampaging sparks to the earth.
“…It’s too low. It won’t strike here.”
Indeed, the bulky bolt of lightning directly headed for the utility poles without hesitation.
“Oi, doesn’t that look… grim?”
Unfortunately, the king of the alleyway now had red lightning under its command.

dataList.title: Blubbering Toad
dataList.prevDesc: O sapo parece estar respirando fundo.
dataList.eventDesc:
O sapo respirou fundo, inflando sua barriga.
Uma lágrima azul ou duas brotaram em seus olhos enormes e redondos.
Esta caverna ficará cheia de um ar de melancolia quando sua boca abrir.
Seria melhor tirar o fôlego dele.
dataList.behaveDesc: Quem impedirá que seu clamor venha à tona?
successDesc:
“I do worry that this might be a little cruel…”

{0} gut-punched the inflated vocal sac.

“Pfarhk!”

A deflating sound rang out in the cave.

“Croough…”

Shrunk back to a slim shape, the toad sniffled. It must have been frustrated that it couldn’t cry out loud like it wanted to.

“How gloomy.”

Though it might have left a bad taste… an opportunity is still an opportunity.
failureDesc:
{0} approached the toad.

“Croak!”

Perhaps the Sinner was a bit too careful.

When {0} got to the toad, its mouth had already begun to open, exhaling a staggeringly gloomy sound.

“Croohoo… Croohic… Croohoo…”

{0} lost consciousness, trapped in sorrow.
Now they merely cry, just as the toad does.

dataList.title: Kqe-1j-23
dataList.prevDesc: O braço mecânico está alcançando o chão. O que ele está fazendo?
dataList.eventDesc:
O boneco mecânico esticou seus fios no chão.
Esses fios então cavaram embaixo como raízes.
Ele está tentando obter eletricidade do chão?

O terminal do robô imprimiu:

<Please Cooperate!>

“…Espere, isso não significa que ele não pode fazer nada enquanto estiver carregando?”

Os Sinners parecem pouco dispostos a ouvir seu pedido.
dataList.behaveDesc: Quem pode sabotar suas tentativas de ataque?
successDesc:
{0} moved quickly.
The mechanical puppet remained still—a perfect opportunity.
A clear sound soon rang in the area.
The Sinner delivered a powerful attack that shattered the puppet’s capacitor.

<Please Cooperrr… Csdk…ppra…@#@%!%^#$>

The terminal was filled with random letters shortly before turning off.
What a perfect strike, wasn’t it?
failureDesc:
{0} moved quickly.
The mechanical puppet remained still—a perfect opportunity.
But alas…

“W-Wait!”

Before the others could warn them, {0}’s weapon struck the wires that the puppet had plugged into the floor.
It should go without saying that touching a high-voltage current with anything remotely conductive has its consequences.
{0} was zapped stiff by the electricity.
Fortunately, the shock wasn’t deadly, but the machine began to move… now pulling its wires off the ground.
Such as it is.
Things don’t always go as planned, do they?

dataList.title: My Form Empties
dataList.prevDesc: A estátua parece tão tranquila como sempre. O que ela poderia estar pensando?
dataList.eventDesc:
Parece que você encontra paz apenas olhando para ela.
A estátua parece estar abraçando a agonia e a angústia de todos.
Não há um eu dentro — apenas todos.
Só pode fazer sentido que alguém perca a vontade de lutar.
No entanto, nenhum homem pode suportar totalmente o sofrimento de outro em seu lugar.
Antes que todos sejamos atraídos por sua falsa compaixão, alguém tem que quebrar a estátua.
dataList.behaveDesc: Quem será capaz de quebrar esta estátua enganosa?
successDesc:
{0} shook their head.
As they looked around, the Sinner saw that everyone else was bowing to the statue. Some were uttering odd mantras as well.
{0} realized that such tranquility was the result of brainwashing.
There is no need to describe how the worshippers would have felt upon realizing this truth.
A powerful attack shattered the statue, and everybody returned to their senses.
failureDesc:
{0} trudged their way to the statue, feet heavy like its stone.
No one could stop the Sinner, as all were busy lowering their heads and bowing to it.
{0} murmured some sort of mantra along the way.
Listening closely, it was a confession. The Sinner was uttering all the negative pasts and thoughts in their mind.
{0} felt that their heart grew lighter and forgiveness grew closer as they divulged, but it was not to come.
The fake bodhisattva was only biding its time to restore its strength, paying little attention to the confession.
And now…
Time is up.

dataList.title: Tango of Poultry Passion
dataList.eventDesc:
A galinha segurando alguns suprimentos de costura implora com olhos de pintinho.
Alguém tem que fazer isso. Esses olhos não podem ser ignorados.
dataList.behaveDesc: Quem tem mãos para essa tarefa?
successDesc:
{0} hesitantly stepped forward.
“Mmh…”
Taking the needle and thread, the Sinner sat behind the chicken.
With awkward but careful hands, they began to stitch the seam with a standard method.
“Kieph.”
Fortunately, it doesn’t seem to feel the pain of the needle.
Once the sewing was done, it hopped into {0}’s lap as if to thank them.
“Kieeh!”
{0} was pleasantly perplexed.
failureDesc:
{0} confidently stepped forward.
“Let’s see…”
Taking the needle and thread, the Sinner sat behind the chicken.
In spite of the initial confidence, however, their stitches became gradually wry.
“Kieerh!”
Before {0} could finish, the chicken pushed the Sinner away.
“…Why didn’t you do it yourself in the first place?”
It snatched the supplies back to sew itself up, then walked out of sight.
{0} was left perplexed.

dataList.title: Shock Centipede
dataList.prevDesc: A centopeia se contorce como se fosse se enrolar.
dataList.eventDesc:
O corpo da Centopeia de Choque está começando a se enrolar em um ponto.
"Parece que a eletricidade está se acumulando."
Como o Pecador apontou, faíscas estão voando do centro de seu corpo enrolado.
Pode ser uma boa ideia pará-lo.
dataList.behaveDesc: Quem será capaz de detê-lo?
successDesc:
[{0}] struck at the Shock Centipede's carapace.
"Ohh...!"
A crack opened up in its hard-looking armor.
Could it really have stopped the centipede?
This ought to be a rare opportunity.
failureDesc:
[{0}] struck at the Shock Centipede's carapace.
Alas...
Could the stored power have sprung forth?
Tremendous showers of sparks popped out of the Centipede's center along with a thunderous boom.
Naturally, [{0}] was knocked away by the shockwave.
Fortunately enough, it only pushed the Sinner away and did little harm...
But the Centipede looks quite angry.
It'd be a good idea to brace up, right?

dataList.title: Drifting Fox
dataList.prevDesc: Será que aqueles guarda-chuvas esfarrapados realmente protegeriam aquela raposa?
dataList.eventDesc:
Velhos guarda-chuvas estão alinhados ao redor da Raposa à Deriva.
Velhos, gastos, guarda-chuvas furados.
Os guarda-chuvas parecem estar ali há sabe-se lá quanto tempo tentando proteger a raposa, mas certamente não parece que eles estão fazendo um bom trabalho nisso.
"……."
Então, um Pecador caminhou lentamente em sua direção.
A raposa percebeu o Pecador se aproximando, mas não rosna, nem relaxa alegremente.
Ela fica parada, mantendo seu lugar sempre constante.
dataList.behaveDesc: Quem se aproximou da raposa?
successDesc:
[{0}] walked toward the fox before getting under a worn umbrella.
Despite being an umbrella, it allowed numerous drops of rain to fall through it.
Chilling winds and damp air brush against the Sinner under the umbrella.
"……."
But [{0}] raised their head up to see the sky, making a profound smile.
As if the Sinner knew the rain will stop someday.
failureDesc:
[{0}] walked toward the fox before getting under a worn umbrella.
Despite being an umbrella, it allowed numerous drops of rain to fall through it.
Chilling winds and damp air brush against the Sinner under the umbrella.
"…Haah."
[{0}] drooped down with a large sigh.
It may not be easy to notice from afar,
but it must have been the cumulation of gloom and dampening the person under the umbrella felt.

dataList.title: So That No One Will Cry
dataList.prevDesc:
A boneca de madeira amaldiçoada parou de se mover.
O que pode estar acontecendo?
dataList.eventDesc:
A boneca de madeira parou no lugar como se nada estivesse acontecendo.
Sua cabeça estava levemente inclinada para baixo como se estivesse examinando seus talismãs...
Ou talvez pudesse estar olhando para os talismãs dos Sinners.
"……."
Como se possuídos, os Sinners começaram a andar em direção à boneca de madeira.
Era como se tivessem esquecido que estavam lutando há alguns momentos.
E eles começaram a remover os talismãs emaranhados em seus corpos.
O que poderia estar acontecendo?
dataList.behaveDesc: Quem reunirá os talismãs e os devolverá?
successDesc:
[{0}] gathered the detached talismans and stood before the wooden doll.
It seems to be gazing silently.
Or, maybe it was just the Sinner's conscience making it seem that way.
The eagerness to return the talismans to where they were.
[{0}] extended their arm to hand over the stack of talismans...
As if drawn by a magnet, the talismans flew toward the doll.
"So that no one will cry..."
After muttering the phrase, [{0}] came back to their position.
failureDesc:
[{0}] gathered the detached talismans and stood before the wooden doll.
"……."
It creaked a little, then stretched a hand at [{0}].
Thinking it's to retrieve the talismans, [{0}] handed over the stack,
"Ah!"
The wooden hand changed its trajectory and touched the Sinner's body.
At that moment, all the talismans on [{0}] began writhing before melting into sticky blood.
…That doesn't bode well, does it?

dataList.title: Fairy Gentleman
dataList.prevDesc: Um cheiro inebriante preenche o ar, quase poderia deixar você bêbado.
dataList.eventDesc:
O Cavalheiro das Fadas falou com uma risada alegre.
"Huhu... Não pensei que tanto seria engolido."
Um pequeno soluço também pôde ser ouvido.
"Admito, me pegou um pouquinho desprevenido... Só um pouquinho."
A fada então coloca o copo em sua mão na boca.
"Ei! Essa coisa está tentando ficar sóbria?"
"Devemos manter o canalha desorientado!"
...Parece que a fada deve ser impedida de beber do copo.
dataList.behaveDesc: Quem pegará a taça do cavalheiro?
successDesc:
[{0}] stood before the gentleman's mountainous belly.
"Ah, I couldn't share this with you, even if you're a privileged guest."
Instead of demanding it, [{0}] just stares into the fairy.
"...Ahem."
Completely still, not moving a muscle.
"...A-Alright, alright! I can give you... a little bit."
[{0}] shook their head.
"Are you... telling me to give you all of it?"
The Sinner nodded.
"You..."
"Fuu, haha. Fine, I've lost. You can have this."
[{0}] finally made a light smile as they claimed the cup.
failureDesc:
[{0}] stood before the gentleman's mountainous belly.
"Ah, I couldn't share this with you, even if you're a privileged guest."
Instead of demanding it, [{0}] just stares into the fairy.
"...Ahem."
Completely still, not moving a muscle.
"...Standing like that won't change my answer, you know?"
After vigorous laughter, the fairy gulped down all of the cup's content into his stomach.
"As much as I care about you, I couldn't give you everything I have, could I? Haha."
Defeated, [{0}] returned.

dataList.title: Looking for a Drone
dataList.eventDesc: Um pecador bom em pesquisar deve ser capaz de ajudar.
dataList.behaveDesc: Quem será mais eficiente no trabalho?
successDesc:
Several wounds were left on [{0}]'s hands while rummaging through the wreckage.
Fortunately, we were able to find a small ampule in it.
"After going through that trouble..."
The other Sinners sighed at the ultimately pointless haul.
...We had to leave the room with my promise that I'll turn the clock for them next time.
failureDesc:
The broken debris was sharper than expected.
"…!"
Several wounds were left on [{0}]'s hands while rummaging through the wreckage.
"Guess there's nothing."
Nothing useful could be found after several more minutes of searching.
"……."
I feel the resentful glares of the Sinners on my back.

dataList.title: Poking at the Egg
dataList.eventDesc:
Considerando nossas experiências com o recebimento de presentes de Anormalidades,
podemos conseguir algo para ajudar a explorar a masmorra aqui.
dataList.behaveDesc:
Quem será o mais eficaz no trabalho?
Uma mão delicada terá mais facilidade.
successDesc:
"Whoa!"
[{0}] touched the egg. It started glowing.
Soon afterwards, it hardened and turned into a uniquely shaped gem.
"This looks worth taking."
[{0}] seemed rather tired, but there wasn't anything off about the body as far as we could see.
We left the place with the gem in our possession.
failureDesc:
"Whoa!"
[{0}] touched the egg. It started glowing.
However, the egg soon crumbled into dust.
"Ugh..."
A mysterious wound was left on [{0}]'s hand.
And the Sinner seemed tired as well.
...We left the room, consoling [{0}].

dataList.title: PickingRowAndColumn
dataList.eventDesc:
Quando você olha mais de perto, você quase consegue ver outra coisa ali.
Um pecador com olhos aguçados pode conseguir algo bom.
dataList.behaveDesc: Quem vai dar uma olhada?
successDesc:
[{0}] looked at the cabinet.
The Sinner discovered a hidden drawer. The drawer contained a number of useful items.
Soon afterward, the area began to blur, and the cabinet disappeared.
failureDesc:
[{0}] looked at the cabinet.
Perhaps the Sinner spent too long pondering; the area began to blur, and the cabinet disappeared.

dataList.title: Try Talking
dataList.eventDesc: Todos os pecadores estavam de frente para a janela.
dataList.behaveDesc: Quem falará com os números?
successDesc: Icriedwithoutachoice. Oh ▽ ! Iaminpain. Ientertainthethought: HowmustIcry. When [{0}] talked to the figures in the window, they writhed and disappeared. Then a fragment fell from the window. We took it and left the room.

Icriedwithoutachoice. Oh ▽ ! Iaminpain. Ientertainthethought: HowmustIcry. When [{0}] talked to the figures in the window, they writhed and disappeared. Then a fragment fell from the window. We took it and left the room.
failureDesc:
…………..
[{0}] tried talking, but there was no response.
Soon enough, the figures writhed and disappeared.
"What, did they want us to sing or something?"
We left the room with the Sinners complaining.

dataList.title: Stand in his way.
dataList.behaveDesc: Você vai parar Dongrang?
successDesc:
[{0}] managed to block Dongrang's attack.

"Haah... You're being a nuisance."

Dongrang muttered as his weapon bounced off.
Beneath his bitter chuckle was a cold fury.
failureDesc:
[{0}] tried to stop Dongrang, but alas...

"Haha, what a futile thing you're doing."

Perhaps the attack was more powerful than anticipated. The Sinner was the one that got knocked away.

"Haah... You're being a nuisance."
"I'd much prefer if you served as seeds... for my accomplishment."

Beneath his mocking grin was a cold fury.

dataList.title: Stand in his way.
dataList.behaveDesc: Você vai parar Dongrang novamente?
successDesc:
[{0}] drove their weapon into Dongrang while his focus was elsewhere.

"Kgh..."

It looks like the attack was successful.
The move Dongrang was preparing didn't come through.

"I see where you stand..."

"Then I'll just get rid of you all along with Yi Sang and his ideal."
failureDesc:
{0}] drove their weapon into Dongrang while his focus was elsewhere.

"Such incompetence."

However, what seemed to be the gap in his defense was merely his trap.
The Sinner was knocked away by his attack.

"Hah, I see where you stand..."

"You leave me with no choice. I'll get rid of you all along with Yi Sang and his ideal."

dataList.title: Stand in his way.
dataList.eventDesc:
"……."

Yi Sang andou na frente.

"Devo insistir... que eu marque o fim para Dongrang."

"...Pois isso seria o mais ideal."
successDesc:
Yi Sang managed to stop Dongrang in his path.

"Yi Sang..."

"I plead you, end this now... Dongrang."

"Haha... How can I?"

"In the end, someone... has to... cry tears, isn't that right...?"

Dongrang pulled the weapon lodged into himself deeper inside.

"…!"

"Let's end it this way... Yi Sang..."

dataList.title: Fairy Longlegs
dataList.prevDesc: O céu parece ter sido coberto novamente. Por que ele continua lançando essa sombra?
dataList.eventDesc:
A planta gigante que a fada fez crescer era tão grossa quanto alta.

Ela tinha suas vantagens.

Como se estivesse se escondendo atrás da coluna de um prédio, um pecador conseguiu escapar da visão da fada.

O pecador então cuidadosamente golpeou o caule.
dataList.behaveDesc: Quem bateu no caule?
successDesc:
Striking at the stem, [{0}] climbed up the plant, hand over foot over hand.

The Sinner climbed so high, the others and the fairy appeared as tiny dots.

The plant seemed endlessly tall, but it had its end.

At last, [{0}] climbed onto the massive leaf at the top.

Then the Sinner carefully walked up to the edge...

And poked a hole in the leaf, causing the pool of water to fall on the fairy's head.

The fairy is making quite a fuss, looking surprised.
failureDesc:
Striking at the stem, [{0}] climbed up the plant, hand over foot over hand.

The Sinner climbed so high, the others and the fairy appeared as tiny dots.

The plant seemed endlessly tall, but it had its end.

At last, [{0}] climbed onto the massive leaf at the top.

But perhaps the Sinner failed to consider the amount of water that ponded on the leaf...

As soon as [{0}] stepped on the leaf, they slipped and fell right to the ground.

...It might be fortunate that the Sinner didn't die.
